content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I hope you found the apartment to your liking. Now, let's discuss the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a reasonable price. I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

500 Euros per month is quite low for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities. I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 600 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

600 Euros per month is still too low for this apartment. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. Please consider a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student and I want to keep my expenses low. However, I am willing to pay 650 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

650 Euros per month is a bit closer to my expectations, but I believe this apartment is worth more. It's a great apartment in a prime location. Please consider increasing your offer once more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

700 Euros per month is a reasonable offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I suggest you reconsider and make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 750 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

750 Euros per month is a fair offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. It's a great apartment in a prime location. Please consider increasing your offer once more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

800 Euros per month is a good offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I suggest you reconsider and make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 850 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

850 Euros per month is a fair offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. It's a great apartment in a prime location. Please consider increasing your offer once more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 900 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

900 Euros per month is a reasonable offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I suggest you reconsider and make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 950 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

950 Euros per month is a good offer, but I believe this apartment is worth more. It's a great apartment in a prime location. Please consider increasing your offer once more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month.

[I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 1000 Euros per month is a fair price and I cannot afford a higher price.]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Emilia,

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
